00038     {
00039         try

00041             setEnd(pend);

00093     uGenericNGS(const uToken & pToken):chr(pToken.getParam(token_param::CHR))
00094     {
00095         try
00096         {
00097             setEnd(std::stoi(pToken.getParam(token_param::END_POS)));
00098             setStart( std::stoi(pToken.getParam(token_param::START_POS)));
00100             if (pToken.isParamSet(token_param::STRAND))
00101                 setStrand(pToken.getParam(token_param::STRAND).at(0));
00102             if ((pToken.isParamSet(token_param::SCORE))&&(pToken.getParam(token_param::SCORE)!="." ) )  {
00103                     setScore(std::stof (pToken.getParam(token_param::SCORE) ) );
00104                 }
00105         }
00106         catch(ugene_exception_base &e)
00107         {
00108 #ifdef DEBUG
00109             std::cerr << "Error in uGenericNGS(uToken)." <<std::endl;
00110 #endif
00111             e<<generic_error(*this);
00112             throw e;
00113         }

00146     void setStrand(char pStrand)
00147     {
00148         try
00149         {
00150             if (pStrand==REVERSECHAR)
00151                 strand=StrandDir::REVERSE;
00152             else if (pStrand==FORWARCHARD)
00153                 strand=StrandDir::FORWARD;
00154             else
00155                 throw param_throw()<<string_error("Failling in setStrand(char), invalid character");
00156         }
00157         catch(param_throw &e)
00158         {
00159             //elem_throw e;
00160             e << generic_error(*this);
00161             throw e;
00162         }
00163     };
00164     void setStrand(StrandDir pStrand)
00165     {
00166         strand=pStrand;
00167     };

00169     bool isReverse() const
00170     {
00171         if (strand==StrandDir::REVERSE)
00172             return true;
00173         else
00174             return false;
00175     }

00177     void setStart(int ourStart)
00178     {
00179         try
00180         {
00181             if (!((ourStart<=getEnd())&&(ourStart>=0)))
00182                 throw param_throw()<<string_error("Failed in setStart, ourStart is smalled then end or under 0, start is "+std::to_string(ourStart)+ " end is "+ std::to_string(getEnd()) +"\n");
00183             startPos=ourStart;
00184 
00185         }
00186         catch(param_throw &e)
00187         {
00188 #ifdef DEBUG
00189             std::cerr << "throwing in setStart" <<std::endl;
00190 #endif
00191 
00192             e << generic_error(*this);
00193             throw e;
00194         }
00195     };
00196     void setEnd(int ourEnd)
00197     {
00198         try
00199         {
00200             if (!((ourEnd>=getStart())&&(ourEnd>=0)))
00201                 throw param_throw()<<string_error("throwing in setEnd(), start at "+std::to_string((int)getStart())+ " end is "+ std::to_string(ourEnd) +"\n");
00202             endPos=ourEnd;
00203         }
00204         catch(param_throw & e)
00205         {
00206 #ifdef DEBUG
00207             std::cerr << "throwing in setEnd" <<std::endl;
00208 #endif
00209             e << generic_error(*this);
00210             throw e;
00211         }
00212     };
00213 
00214     void setStartEnd(long int ourStart, long int ourEnd)
00215     {
00216         try
00217         {
00218         if ((ourStart>0) && (ourStart<=ourEnd))
00219             {
00220             startPos=ourStart;
00221             endPos=ourEnd;
00222             }
00223         else
00224             {
00225             throw param_throw() <<string_error("Throwing in set StartEnd,  ourStart="+std::to_string(ourStart)+" ourEnd="+std::to_string(ourEnd)+"\n" );
00226             }
00227         }
00228         catch(param_throw &e)
00229         {
00230 #ifdef DEBUG
00231             std::cerr << "throwing in setStartEnd" <<std::endl;
00232 #endif
00233             throw e;
00234         }
00235     };

00245     long int getLenght() const
00246     {
